DOC.brief_summary: In addition motor sensory function , sexual function change spinal cord injury consider one common problem , range decrease sexual desire disturbance erection , orgasm ejaculation . Objective : To assess impact complexity traumatic spinal cord injury male sexual function .
DOC.brief_title: Level Degree Spinal Cord Injury Its Impact Male Sexual Function
DOC.detailed_description: Methods : Observational study ( CEAC 41221414.5.0000.5208 ) conduct 45 men , mean age 34 ( CI 31.5 37.1 ) , spinal cord injury active sex life . Sexual function assess International Index Erectile Function ( IIEF ) level degree injury determine follow guideline International Standards Neurological Functional Examination Classification Spinal Cord Injury . Data collect least six month injury referral hospital . Descriptive statistic bivariate analysis apply observe association sexual function complexity lesion , 0.05 significance level .
